nodes.text: E. E. Emmons lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The individual was an adornment specialist who under Imperial law, as a one time gift, would send furniture to purchasers of houses if they were properly documented.

E. E. Emmons was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Strongholds, an expansion for Star Wars: The Old Republic released in 2014. After the player purchased a stronghold, E. E. Emmons would send mail to the player containing furniture and credits.
